username.title: Username
username.description: Username to connect to Teradata. This user should have privileges to read all the metadata in Teradata.

logmech.title: LOGMECH
logmech.description: Specifies the logon authentication method. Possible values are TD2 (the default), JWT, LDAP, KRB5 for Kerberos, or TDNEGO

logdata.title: Extra data for the chosen logon authentication method (LOGDATA)
logdata.description: Specifies additional data needed by a logon mechanism, such as a secure token, Distinguished Name, or a domain/realm name. LOGDATA values are specific to each logon mechanism.

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and port of the Teradata service.

tmode.title: Transaction mode
tmode.description: Specifies the transaction mode for the connection

account.title: Teradata Database account
account.description: Specifies an account string to override the default account string defined for the database user. Accounts are used by the database for workload management and resource usage monitoring.

connectionOptions.title: Connection Options
connectionOptions.description: Additional connection options to build the URL that can be sent to service during the connection.

connectionArguments.title: Connection Arguments
connectionArguments.description: Additional connection arguments such as security or protocol configs that can be sent to service during connection.

schemaFilterPattern.title: Default Schema Filter Pattern
schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude schemas that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

tableFilterPattern.title: Default Table Filter Pattern
tableFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude tables that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

databaseFilterPattern.title: Default Database Filter Pattern
databaseFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude databases that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

storedProcedureFilterPattern.title: Default Stored Procedure Filter Pattern
storedProcedureFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude stored procedures that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

supportsQueryComment.title: Supports Query Comment
supportsQueryComment.description: For Database Services using SQLAlchemy, True to enable running a comment for all queries run from OpenMetadata.

sampleDataStorageConfig.title: Storage Config for Sample Data
sampleDataStorageConfig.description: Storage config to store sample data

oneOf.title: Sample Data Storage Config
oneOf.description: Storage config to store sample data

filePathPattern.title: File Path Pattern
filePathPattern.description: Provide the pattern of the path where the generated sample data file needs to be stored.

overwriteData.title: Overwrite Sample Data
overwriteData.description: When this field enabled a single parquet file will be created to store sample data, otherwise we will create a new file per day

profileName.title: Profile Name
profileName.description: The name of a profile to use with the boto session.

assumeRoleArn.title: Role Arn for Assume Role
assumeRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume. Required Field in case of Assume Role

assumeRoleSessionName.title: Role Session Name for Assume Role
assumeRoleSessionName.description: An identifier for the assumed role session. Use the role session name to uniquely identify a session when the same role is assumed by different principals or for different reasons. Required Field in case of Assume Role

assumeRoleSourceIdentity.title: Source Identity for Assume Role
assumeRoleSourceIdentity.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume. Optional Field in case of Assume Role
